[[File:Alarie - Gandalf Crosses the Sarn Ford.jpg|thumb|250px|''Gandalf Crosses the Sarn Ford'' by [[:Category:Images by Alarie|Alarie]]]]
'''Sarn Ford''' was the stone ford on the River [[Baranduin]], on the far southern borders of [[the Shire]]. It was guarded by the [[Rangers of the North]]. However, on [[22 September]] {{TA|3018}}, the Rangers were driven off by the arrival in the evening of the [[Nazgûl|Ringwraiths]].<ref>{{App|Great}}</ref>

A road beginning at [[Waymeet]] crossed the ford, which met the [[Greenway]] further south. By this road [[Khamûl]] the Ringwraith entered the Shire during the [[War of the Ring]].

In {{FoA|63}}, [[Peregrin Took]] and [[Meriadoc Brandybuck]] passed Sarn Ford on their way to [[Rohan]], the last time they were seen in the Shire.<ref>{{App|Later}}</ref>

==Etymology==
''Sarn Ford'' was so named by the [[Númenóreans]], after [[Sarn Athrad]] in [[Beleriand]].<ref name="RC">{{HM|RC}}, p. 163</ref>

The name is a half-translation of the [[Elvish]] ([[Sindarin]]) name ''[[Sarn Athrad|Sarn-athrad]]'', meaning "stony-ford" (''[[sarn]]'' + ''[[athrad]]'').<ref name="RC"/><ref name="Nomen">{{HM|N}}, p. 775</ref>

==Inspirations==
Perhaps [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] was inspired by the landscape of his childhood: "''Hall Green village was only a little distance away [from Sarehole] down a lane and '''across a ford.'''''".<ref>[[Humphrey Carpenter]], ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: A Biography]]''</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''1982-97: ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]'':'''
: Sarn Ford (colloquial name for ''Iach Sarn'' or ''Athrad Sarn'') is a ford maintained by an Arthedain garrison. The site is given a detailed description and history.<ref>{{ICE|4002}}</ref><ref>{{ICE|2017}}</ref><ref>{{ICE|2023}}</ref> 

'''2011: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]'':'''
:Sarn Ford is the starting location of the game, shortly after the Nazgûl attacked the Rangers who guarded the Shire. [[Eradan (video game character)|Eradan]], [[Andriel]] and [[Farin (video game character)|Farin]] meet [[Halbarad]], who sends them to [[Bree]] to warn [[Aragorn]].<ref name="Oxmonline">[http://www.oxmonline.com/ Official Xbox Magazine Online], [http://www.oxmonline.com/article/previews/g-l/lord-rings-war-north The Lord of the Rings: War in the North], dated [[28 April]], [[2011]] (accessed at [[7 July]], [[2011]])</ref>

[[File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Sarn Ford.jpg|thumb|Sarn Ford in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'']]
'''2022: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:Sarn Ford is on the western edge of in-game [[Cardolan]] region. It is visited on [[26 September]] as the Rangers led by Halbarad are still recovering from the attack.
